2.text: Mix 5 tbsp of olive oil, 3 tsp of salt, and 2 tsp of pepper in a bowl.

3.text: Rub the mixture into the chicken using your hands or a pastry brush.

4.text: Coat a large cooking sheet with a nonstick spray.

5.text: Place the chicken breasts on the cooking sheet a few inches apart.

6.text: Place the oven rack about 6 inches (15 cm) from the heat source.

7.text: Preheat the oven’s broiler about 5 minutes before cooking.

8.text: Put the cooking sheet with the seasoned chicken under the broiler.

9.text: Broil the chicken for about 10 minutes, leaving the oven door ajar.

10.text: Watch the chicken breasts carefully as they cook.

11.text: Turn the chicken over with metal tongs when one side has browned.

12.text: Brush the chicken with additional olive oil and seasoning.

13.text: Broil the chicken for 10 more minutes or until fully cooked.

14.text: Remove the chicken and let it sit for 5 minutes before serving.
